title: AI scams surge in Toronto over past 6 months: police
description: The Toronto Police Service’s financial crimes unit is seeing more and more scams utilizing Artificial Intelligence tools, which they say is making fraud increasingly difficult to detect.
content:

title: Northeast Ohio hospitals partner with tech companies to implement AI
description: Northeast Ohio hospitals are using artificial intelligence in multiple ways. Here's how the tech is built, implemented and used.
content:
Northeast Ohio hospitals are increasingly using artificial intelligence to improve patient care.
AI is used for various tasks, from reading radiology scans to identifying high-risk patients.

title: Woman, 21, 'asked ChatGPT how to kill' before 'drugging two men to death'

content:

title: AI is widely used by students, but schools still struggle with guidance
description: New research from the College Board indicates that the use of artificial intelligence is on the rise, but policy guidelines are lagging.
content:
Georgia schools are looking for new ways to implement AI policies and curriculum, but many educators don’t feel at ease about its use in their classroom.
(Photo Illustration: Philip Robibero / AJC | Source: Getty)

title: AI cannot replace core functions in legal profession, trained mind will prevail: Justice Viswanathan
description: Justice Viswanathan said there had been instances in the court when lawyers relied on AI-generated citations that have turned out to be fictitious. He advised that artificial intelligence should be used like any other professional tool - with skill, caution, and with one's own mind firmly in charge.
